const rpslsText = "This is simple game of Rock, Paper, Scissors with Lizard and Spock added.  It is technically based on the show 'The Big Bang Theory', but it's actually based on a google search for rock paper scissors.  It is currently written in vanilla Javascript with plans to rewrite it using a different framework in the future.  The multiplayer functionality uses Firebase's Real-time database.";
export default rpslsText;
